name: Dr.Shakthiganesan M
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Mathematics )  - SBK College   - 2010M.Sc  ( Mathematics )  - SBK College   - 2012Ph.D  ( Mathematics )  - SBK College Supervisor: DR. R. VEMBU
in_brief: Dr. M. Shakthiganesan  done his Ph. D. and M. Phil., in SBK College, an affiliated institution of Madurai Kamaraj University. He cleared both National Eligibility Test for Lecturership and  State Eligibility Test in general category. His area of interest is topological structures and fixed point theory.

publications.title: Solving a class of  Fredholm integral  inclusions via fixed point  theorems in the turf of  D_C - WD mappings
